required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Camrelizumab in Real-World Study
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety of Camrelizumab for Chinese NSCLC Patients: a Retrospective, Observational, Multicenter Real-World Study

brief_summary.textblock: This observational real-world study is designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of camrelizumab for the treatment of Chinese NSCLC patients.

detailed_description.textblock:
Camrelizumab is a humanized antibody for cancer immunotherapy. The National Medical Products Administration (NMPA, China) approved camrelizumab as a first-line treatment of certain patients with NSCLC.
This is a multicenter non-interventional study, NSCLC patients who have been treated with camrelizumab will be included. The main objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of camrelizumab in the clinical practice.

primary_outcome.description: Neoadjuvant therapy population: pathological complete response rate (pCR).
Neoadjuvant therapy population: R0 resection rate.
Advanced non-small cell lung cancer: objective response rate (ORR).
Advanced non-small cell lung cancer: 6-month progression-free survival rate (PFS%).

secondary_outcome.description: Neoadjuvant population: main pathological response rate (MPR)
Neoadjuvant population: incidence of major postoperative complications (within 30 days after surgery).
First-line combined treatment population: median treatment cycle number, intracranial objective response rate (iORR) in patients with brain metastasis.
First-line combined treatment population: median treatment cycle number, intracranial progression-free survival (iPFS) in patients with brain metastasis.
Safety of the general population: Adverse Events (AE).
Safety of the general population: Serious Adverse Events (SAE).

arm_group.description: Patients with advanced non-small cell lung cancer treated with camrelizumab. Dosage form, dosage, frequency and duration of camrelizumab is determined according to the investigator's actual clinical practice.

study_pop.textblock: Total 450 patients who have received camrelizumab with NSCLC will be enrolled. The patients should be registered consecutively in each site.

overall_official.affiliation: Guangdong Lung Cancer Institute, Guangdong General Hospital, Guangdong Academy of Medical Sciences

facility.name: Guangdong Lung Cancer Institute, Guangdong General Hospital, Guangdong Academy of Medical Sciences
